pr_title: Add a note on MongoDB Panache doc about query on same field

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
             * using multiple times the same field on a query is not allowed using PanacheQL as is it would generate an invalid JSON
          
          
            
             * using the same field multiple times in a query is not allowed using PanacheQL as it would generate an invalid JSON
timeline.author: gsmet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -85,6 +85,11 @@ * *

*

+ * WARNING: MongoDB queries must be valid JSON documents, + * using multiple times the same field on a query is not allowed using PanacheQL as is it would generate an invalid JSON

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/extensions/panache/mongodb-panache/runtime/src/main/java/io/quarkus/mongodb/panache/package-info.java b/extensions/panache/mongodb-panache/runtime/src/main/java/io/quarkus/mongodb/panache/package-info.java index 78006f0366..1e845ecd17 100644 --- a/extensions/panache/mongodb-panache/runtime/src/main/java/io/quarkus/mongodb/panache/package-info.java +++ b/extensions/panache/mongodb-panache/runtime/src/main/java/io/quarkus/mongodb/panache/package-info.java @@ -86,7 +86,7 @@ *

*

* WARNING: MongoDB queries must be valid JSON documents, - * using multiple times the same field on a query is not allowed using PanacheQL as is it would generate an invalid JSON + * using the same field multiple times in a query is not allowed using PanacheQL as it would generate an invalid JSON * (see this issue on github: https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/issues/12086). *

*
